title: Is it illegal to go in an abandoned building and smash a window? - Quora
tags: Legal Issues and Law in Everyday Life

response.answer_text: Nothing is truly abandoned. Somebody somewhere has some financial interest in it no matter how small that might be. It is trespassing and vandalism. You don’t own it. Did your parents not teach you that you don’t have a right to destroy property of another ?
I am in agreement with the other good answers. It's not yours. Keep your destructive hands to yourself. No it is not legal. It is criminal trespass and destruction of property, public or private.
